title: Increase govt spending - money demand and nom IR

content.question: An increase in government spending will affect the demand for money and nominal interest rates in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Demand for Money Nominal Interest Rates Increase Increase
Demand for Money Nominal Interest Rates Increase Decrease
Demand for Money Nominal Interest Rates Increase Indeterminate
Demand for Money Nominal Interest Rates Decrease Increase
Demand for Money Nominal Interest Rates Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Demand for Money Nominal Interest Rates Increase Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
